item.title: Designing an App with Friends
item.description: One conversation turned into a company LikeNow started from a single conversation. Joey had the realization that startup "dogfooding" culture had left out lower-income citizens from the majority of startup ideas. I was working on an on-demand company to buy back used electronics with a demographic mainly in lower-income areas. After that conversation, Joey and I decided to join forces, both expanding the concept from just buying back used electronics, to covering the entire spectrum of the Craigslist Economy.
